WorkItem.Description:
While I understand that Partially Cata Ready means we should not use this model for gear selection, I also feel that it is not even close and request a downgrade until a developer can be found or others have time to correct some of the deficiencies. Currently the glyphs aren't listed properly and/or are missing; spells that are part of almost all rotations are not included; gemming templates are for Pre-Cata only. Looking at Stat values (as a guideline not a measuring stick); my intelligence was only worth 0.0 when it should be my highest (by far IAW EJ). The model is so far off that it will actual say that a +20 intelligence gem is BETTER than a +40 one.
Â 
With this downgrade, users should be less inclined to create issues for this model until some work is done on it but even more importantly users will not be inclined to spend time creating/setting up a toon then get frustrated due to the highly inaccurate results. Attaching file as an example for the backwards gemming recommendations.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Healadin] Downgrade from Partial to NOT Cata Ready

Comments.Message: All glyphs have been reviewed and updated to 4.1.0 for next version. So at least that part is out of the way.
Healadin got two major patches and some more to come shortly. It definately qualifies for Partial and in the coming versions will become Mostly as well.
